name: threshold-ui
description: Dark UI theme for Atom, with a more native Windows 10 feel.

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description: Change the UI font size. Needs to be between 8 and 20. In Auto mode, the Font Size will automatically change based on the window size.

layoutMode.title: Layout Mode
layoutMode.description: In Auto mode, the UI will automatically adapt based on the window size.

tabSizing.title: Tab Sizing
tabSizing.description: In minimum width mode the tabs will be as small as possible but in even width mode, all tabs will be the same size. In auto mode the tabs switch based on the window size.
